notes_translated.fr: Les garderies et les établissements scolaires primaires ou secondaires doivent être exempts le plus possible de pesticides. Ainsi, seule l'application de certains pesticides est autorisée, sous certaines conditions, à l'intérieur ou à l'extérieur de ces établissements (Code de gestion des pesticides, art. 32 et 33). Les produits autorisés sont les biopesticides et les pesticides contenant l'un des ingrédients actifs mentionnés à l'Annexe II du Code. Cette liste, rendue disponible aux fins d’application de cette exigence, indique le type de produit, son numéro d’homologation en vertu de la Loi sur les produits antiparasitaires, son nom commercial, l'ingrédient actif autorisé qu'il contient ainsi que la classe à laquelle il appartient en vertu du Règlement sur les permis et les certificats pour la vente et l'utilisation des pesticides.
notes_translated.en-t-fr: Childcare centres and primary or secondary schools must be free from pesticides as much as possible. Thus, only the application of certain pesticides is permitted, under certain conditions, inside or outside these establishments (Pesticide Management Code, ss. 32 and 33). Authorized products are biopesticides and pesticides containing one of the active ingredients listed in Schedule II of the Code. This list, made available for the purposes of this requirement, indicates the type of product, its registration number under the Pest Control Products Act, its trade name, the authorized active ingredient contained therein, and the class to which it belongs under the Permits and Certificates for the Sale Regulations and the use of pesticides.

Thus, only the application of certain pesticides is permitted, under certain conditions, inside or outside these establishments (Pesticide Management Code, ss. 32 and 33). Authorized products are biopesticides and pesticides containing one of the active ingredients listed in Schedule II of the Code. This list, made available for the purposes of this requirement, indicates the type of product, its registration number under the Pest Control Products Act, its trade name, the authorized active ingredient contained therein, and the class to which it belongs under the Permits and Certificates for the Sale Regulations and the use of pesticides.
